summary: A requirements meeting was started; no decisions were made. Sarah (PM) asked for a project name and other roles (Architect, Developer, QA) did not provide input.

actions.task: Propose and confirm the project name
Solicit input from Architect, Developer, and QA on the project name and initial requirements

backlog_deltas.title: Add backlog item to decide and record the project name

risks.risk: Key roles (Architect, Developer, QA) did not provide input during the meeting, risking incomplete or delayed requirements.
risks.mitigation: Schedule a follow-up meeting or set clear deadlines for input; assign owners for collecting responses and document feedback in the backlog item.
